meanings.sent1: The amount of time we have to finish the project is finite.
meanings.sent2: The universe is believed to be finite in size.
meanings.sent3: I can only eat a finite number of cookies before feeling sick.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was finite, and she finally lost her temper.
meanings.sent5: The finite number of seats available made getting tickets difficult.

meanings.sent1: Our resources are finite and must be used wisely.
meanings.sent2: The supply of fresh water on the island is finite.
meanings.sent3: His appetite seemed to be finite until he saw the dessert menu.
meanings.sent4: The possibilities are finite, but our imagination is not.
meanings.sent5: The finite amount of daylight meant we had to work quickly.

meanings.sent1: The garden had a finite area for planting vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The storage capacity of the device is finite.
meanings.sent3: His collection of stamps was finite, but his enthusiasm was endless.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as infinite as the ocean, but his was only finite.
meanings.sent5: The finite number of pages in the book made it a quick read.
